name: mcp-server
description: This is an implementation of the [Model Context Protocol (MCP) server](https://modelcontextprotocol.org/) that exposes tools powered by [Integration App](https://integration.app).

INTEGRATION_APP_TOKEN.description: Token for accessing Integration App API
INTEGRATION_APP_TOKEN.title: INTEGRATION_APP_TOKEN

INTEGRATION_KEY.description: Key of the integration you want to use tools for
INTEGRATION_KEY.title: INTEGRATION_KEY
